EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading the O'Reilly report on Cloud Native Application Architectures
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the O’Reilly report on Migrating to Cloud Native Application Architectures <[[http://pivotal.io/platform/migrating-to-cloud-native-application-architectures-ebook?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=text-link&utm_campaign=oreilly-Stine-ebook-q116]]> authored by Matt Stine, Senior Product Manager, Spring Cloud Services for Pivotal Cloud Foundry at Pivotal.
This O’Reilly report defines the unique characteristics of cloud native application architectures such as microservices and twelve-factor applications. Stine examines the cultural, organizational, and technical changes necessary to migrate traditional monolithic applications and service-oriented architectures to cloud native architectures. You’ll also find a Migration Cookbook, with recipes for decomposing monolithic applications into microservices, implementing fault-tolerant patterns, and performing automated testing of cloud native services.
In case you missed it, we have an on-demand Cloud Native Journey Webinar Series that you might find interesting. You can view the recordings on-demand, view the Slideshare presentations, and learn more about the journey to becoming Cloud Native here <[[http://pivotal.io/cloud-native-journey-webinar-series?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=text-link&utm_campaign=oreilly-Stine-ebook-q117]]>.
No matter where you are in your journey, keep up on the latest Pivotal Cloud Foundry developments and success stories with our blogs <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/]]>, podcasts <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal]]>, and on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/pivotalcf/]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
